		"description": {
			"lang": "en",
			"text": "The hotel is located in the Batel district, one of the city's finest districts, close to the Curitiba and Crystal shopping centers, in an area full of bars, restaurants and businesses. 11.2 miles (18 km) from Afonso Pena Airport in São José dos Pinhais. The facilities include heated swimming pool, sauna, games room, fitness center, children's play area and a business center. Enjoy delicious Italian cuisine at the Allure Restaurant and Lounge Bar. Four meeting rooms with a maximum capacity of 100 people."
		},
